"""Test norm_dist"""
src1 = SimpleSource()
src1.ra = 0
src1.dec = 0
src1.a = 1.0
src1.b = 1.0
src1.pa = 0.0
src2 = SimpleSource()
src2.ra = 0
src2.dec = 1 / 3600.0
src2.a = 1
src2.b = 1
src2.pa = 0.0
if not cluster.norm_dist(src1, src1) == 0:
    raise AssertionError()
if not cluster.norm_dist(src1, src2) == 1 / math.sqrt(2):
    raise AssertionError()
